job.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer
job.description: There is only one Data Cloud Snowflakes founders started from scratch and designed a data platform built for the cloud that is effective affordable and accessible to all data users But it didnt stop there They engineered Snowflake to power the Data Cloud where thousands of organizations unlock the value of their data with nearunlimited scale concurrency and performance This is our vision a world with endless insights to tackle the challenges and opportunities of today and reveal the possibilities of tomorrowbrbrHow do you make the worlds most powerful Cloud Data Platform a delight to use We are the fastest growing software company at this scale in history and looking to push that to new heights by building the single best visual user experience in the industrybrbrThe Snowflake Data Cloud is the first to realize the full potential of the massive New Data Economy We were the first to introduce truly frictionless data sharing have a rapidly growing data marketplace and monetization platform and are powering the most complete Analytics platform with a seamless and intuitive visual experience powerful data visualizations and world class management interfacebrbrWe are looking for talented frontend engineers to help us continue to grow and build compelling new experiences using a bestofbreed tech stack ReactHooks Typescript NodeJS Kubernetes Go Bring your passion for delighting customers and deep experience building cutting edge web apps and help us build the future of the Data CloudbrbrstronguAs a Senior Front End Engineer You WillbrustrongulliLead and drive projects that span our stack including go and node services hosted in Kubernetes and a UI written in typescript and reacthooksliliPromote strong collaboration within a cross functional team including design product managementliliDeliver features requiring close coordination with several sister teams such as data sharing cloud infrastructure and crossregion replication liliBe a strong contributor to the product vision and drive team planningliliMentor and coach junior team membersliliBuild for scale and high performancebrliulstronguOur Ideal Senior Front End Engineer Will HavebrustrongulliSignificant software development experience including 5 years of experience in product web UI application developmentliliExperience contributing to interactive dashboards and visualization platforms andor rich interactive GIS applications desirable liliDistributed system development experience is a big plusliliDeep understanding of modern web applications design architecture good API design patterns performance and scaleliliDemonstrated technical leadership experience such as being an architect or tech lead for high impact customer facing projectsliliExperience in modern technologies such as javascript typescript react angular node liliExperience with Canvas SVG and other visualization toolslibraries a plus brliulstrongWHY JOIN THE ENGINEERING TEAM AT SNOWFLAKEbrbrstrongstronguAs a Member Of Our Team You WillbrbrustrongBuilding cutting edge cloud technologies is complex and our engineering team surmounts the obstaclesbrulliBuild an industryleading data platform that customers loveliliCreate intuitive elegant and accessible user interfaces that make a powerful and highly technical product simple to use liliLearn about and contribute toliulliSuperrobust and secure enterprise SaaS platform that services hundreds of customers and millions of complex queries dailyliliHighlyscalable and reliable data processing platform that runs on hundreds and thousands of machinesliliUser interfaces bridging the enterprise world with the consumer experienceliulliJoin a worldclass team of both industry veterans and rising starsbrliulSnowflake is growing fast and were scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth We are looking for people who share our values challenge ordinary thinking and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and SnowflakebrbrHow do you want to make your impact
